channel.title: Poisoning a few seconds before the day ends
channel.description: It's really annoying that you can get poisoned just as the day ends. I feel like the poison/bleed abilities should be disabled earlier so people have more time to say they were poisoned/bled. I was in a game where I was randomly poisoned by butler on d2 as good king right before night. Like if somebody is a slow typer or just spaced out for two seconds or whatever, they're just going to die. That's not fun.
